name: Thou Shalt Not Kill (Slazo)
description:
A short game where the only way to progress is without killing or being killed. Despite your gun wanting nothing but blood.

Created by Sean "Slazo" Hickman  (@Slazoking), for the GMTK Game Jam 2020. Please leave your feedback, it's been a long, long time since I last dusted off my coding skills.

This game uses the following assets:

  • Animated Top Down Survivor Player by Riley Gombart, licensed under CC-BY 3.0
  • Bullet Collection 2 (M484 Games) by Master484, licensed under CC0
  • Sci-Fi Interior Tiles, by Buch, licensed under CC0
  • Chaingun, Pistol, Rifle, Shotgun Shots by Michel Baradari, licensed under CC-BY 3.0
  • Digital Evening by bluszcz, licensed under CC-BY 3.0
  • Laser Fire by dklon, licensed under CC-BY 3.0
  • Fight Them Until We Can't by Zander Noriega, licensed under CC-BY 3.0
  • Rock_Breaking by Blender Foundation, licensed under CC-BY 3.0
  • Warning Font by DMZL Graphics, licensed under Free for Commercial Use

Additional sound effects provided by... me! See if you can hear them!

Thanks for playing!
